pkgmetadata.longdescription: Kernel modules for Intersil Prism2/2.5/3 based IEEE 802.11b wireless LAN products. This package contains the kernel modules for the linux-wlan-ng project. The kernel modules are provided in a separate package so that they can be more easily re-emerged when the kernel is updated.
